DOC.brief_summary: GAPcare ( Geriatric Acute & Post-acute Care Coordination Program Fall Prevention ) early stage investigation survey older adult present Emergency Department illness determine feasibility Emergency Department ( ED ) -based multidisciplinary intervention prevent recurrent fall old adult . In observational study , old adult approach routine clinical care ED ask prior fall , prior experience fall treat inpatient outpatient setting , investigator solicit feedback potential improvement care ED setting fall .
DOC.criteria: Study inclusion criterion GAPcare Adult 65 yearsold old Able communicate English No cognitive impairment ( ≥4 SIS ) Exclusion criterion • Unable give inform consent due intoxication alter mental status
